dashboard-no-profile.title: Getting Started with Your Workplace Passport

sections.heading: Welcome to Workwise
sections.text: Your Digital Workplace Passport helps you document and share your workplace needs with your line manager, promoting a more inclusive work environment.

screenshot.caption: Select your profile to get started

sections.heading: Getting Started
sections.text: To begin using your workplace passport:
callouts: Select your profile from the dropdown menu
Explore the category tiles to see available topics
Click on any category to start adding your responses
Use the email button to share your responses with your line manager

sections.heading: Dashboard Overview
sections.text: Your dashboard shows category tiles representing different workplace topics. Each tile displays your progress and allows you to navigate to specific areas.

screenshot.alt: Dashboard with category tiles showing user progress
screenshot.caption: Dashboard showing your progress across different categories

sections.heading: Using the Dashboard
sections.text: Here's how to navigate your workplace passport:
callouts: Click on any category tile to explore questions in that area
View your response progress on each tile
Access your actions and resources from the dedicated tiles
Use the email button in the header to share your responses

sections.heading: What's Next?
sections.text: Start by exploring categories that are most relevant to your role and workplace needs. You can always come back to add more responses later.

sections.heading: About Actions
sections.text: Actions are personal plans you create to help address workplace challenges. They help you track your progress and can be shared with your line manager.

screenshot.alt: Actions list showing personal action items
screenshot.caption: Your personal actions list with progress tracking

sections.heading: Working with Actions
sections.text: You can manage your actions in several ways:
callouts: Add new actions using the 'Add Action' button
Mark actions as complete when finished
Edit existing actions to update progress
Set actions as public/private to control sharing
Track your overall progress over time

sections.heading: Sharing Actions
sections.text: Public actions can be included in emails to your line manager, helping them understand your proactive approach to workplace challenges.

sections.heading: Available Resources
sections.text: Resources are helpful materials, links, and information related to workplace support and neurodivergent needs.

screenshot.alt: Resources page showing available support materials
screenshot.caption: Browse available workplace support resources

sections.heading: Using Resources
callouts: Learn about workplace accommodations
Find support materials for specific challenges
Access external links and tools
Discover best practices for workplace inclusion
Get guidance on communicating your needs

sections.heading: Exploring Categories
sections.text: Categories group related workplace topics and questions. Each category contains questions you can respond to about your workplace needs and preferences.

screenshot.caption: Questions within a category ready for your responses

sections.heading: Responding to Questions
callouts: Click on any question to add or edit your response
Provide detailed, honest responses about your needs
Set response visibility (public/private)
Save your responses to track your workplace passport
Return anytime to update or refine your answers

sections.heading: Managing Your Responses
sections.text: Your responses document your workplace needs, preferences, and experiences. You have full control over what you share and with whom.

screenshot.alt: Response editing interface showing privacy controls
screenshot.caption: Edit responses and control their visibility

sections.heading: Response Privacy
sections.text: You control the visibility of each response:
callouts: Public responses can be shared with your line manager
Private responses remain confidential to you
Change visibility settings anytime
Only you decide what information to share
Your privacy is always protected

sections.heading: Editing Responses
sections.text: You can update your responses as your needs change or as you gain new insights about your workplace preferences.

sections.heading: Sharing Your Workplace Passport
sections.text: The email preview shows a summary of your public responses and actions that can be shared with your line manager.

screenshot.alt: Email preview showing formatted workplace passport summary
screenshot.caption: Preview your workplace passport before sharing

sections.heading: Before Sending
callouts: Check that all information accurately represents your needs
Verify only public responses and actions are included
Ensure the tone and content feel appropriate
Add any additional context if needed
Remember you control when and what to share

sections.heading: Sending the Email
sections.text: When you're ready, the email will be sent to your line manager with a professional summary of your workplace passport, helping facilitate productive conversations about your needs.
